joined-subclass.name: com.navis.road.business.model.TruckVisitDetails
joined-subclass.meta: create index tvdtls_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_visit_details(pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;
create spatial index tvdtls_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_visit_details(pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

component.name: tvdtlsPosition
component.meta: The position of the truck from the perspective of this facility

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the truck within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: tvdtlsTransactionCount
property.formula: ( SELECT COUNT(road_truck_transactions.nbr) FROM road_truck_transactions WHERE (road_truck_transactions.truck_visit_gkey = tvdtls_gkey) AND (road_truck_transactions.status != 'CANCEL'))
property.meta: Number of transactions in the truck visit.

many-to-one.name: tvdtlsNextExchangeArea
many-to-one.meta: Exchange area at which the truck will be handled (for the next transaction)

class.name: com.navis.road.business.model.TruckTransaction
class.meta: create index tran_chs_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_transactions(chs_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; create index tran_ctr_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_transactions(ctr_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

create spatial index tran_chs_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_transactions(chs_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); create spatial index tran_ctr_pos_anchor_idx on road_truck_transactions(ctr_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: tranCtrCenterToChassisBackMm
property.meta: The distance from the center of the container to the back of the chassis

property.name: tranCtrNbrDataSource
property.meta: Data source of the tranCtrNbr field

property.name: tranChsNbrDataSource
property.meta: Data source of the tranChsNbr field

many-to-one.name: tranCtrMnrStatus
many-to-one.meta: Maintenance and Repair status for container

property.name: tranVentUnit
property.meta: Unit (%,cubic feet per minute, etc.) that goes with the vent required and vent setting fields.

property.name: trkcIsExamSiteCarrier
property.meta: True if this Trucking Company is allowed to pickup Cargo that needs Exam.

property.name: trkcExamAuthExpiration
property.meta: Expiration date of authorization for the trucking company to pickup Cargo that needs Exam.

property.name: trkcIsSeizedCargoCarrier
property.meta: True if this Trucking Company is allowed to pickup Seized Cargo.

property.name: trkcSeizedCargoAuthExpiration
property.meta: Expiration date of authorization for the trucking company to pickup Seized Cargo.

property.name: trkcRefId
property.meta: Reference information recorded for trucking company

many-to-one.meta: Deprecated: Truck driver is associated with

many-to-one.name: trkcDefaultEdo
many-to-one.meta: Default EDO for this trucking company

class.meta: Domain entity for a System or User Definable Truck

many-to-one.meta: The last Trucking Company truck drove for

many-to-one.meta: The last Driver that drove this truck

many-to-one.meta: Reference to the Truck Company Table

property.name: inspVentUnit
property.meta: Unit (%,cubic feet per minute, etc.) that goes with the vent required and vent setting fields.

property.name: docStageId
property.meta: Gate Stage ID at which this document was created

property.name: docmsgStageId
property.meta: Gate Stage ID at which this document message was created

class.name: com.navis.road.business.model.TruckVisitStats
class.meta: CREATE INDEX tvstat_tvstatus_complete_idx ON road_truck_visit_stats (tv_status, completed);

many-to-one.name: tvstatLineRcv
many-to-one.meta: Reference to Line Operator for first recieval

many-to-one.name: tvstatLineDlv
many-to-one.meta: Reference to Line Operator for first delivery

property.name: tvstatTroubleResolveTime
property.formula: ( SELECT SUM(road_truck_visit_stages.trouble_resolve_time) FROM road_truck_visit_stages WHERE (road_truck_visit_stages.tvstat_gkey = gkey) AND (road_truck_visit_stages.had_trouble = 1))
property.meta: The total time to resolve the problem that occured in any stages of visit(in milliseconds).

property.name: tvstatTurnTimeNet
property.formula: COALESCE(turn_time,0) - ( SELECT SUM(COALESCE(road_truck_visit_stages.trouble_resolve_time,0)) FROM road_truck_visit_stages WHERE (road_truck_visit_stages.tvstat_gkey = gkey) AND (road_truck_visit_stages.had_trouble = 1))
property.meta: Truck turn time minus truck trouble time(in milliseconds).

class.name: com.navis.road.business.model.TruckVisitStage
class.meta: CREATE INDEX tvstage_hadtrouble_tvstat_idx ON road_truck_visit_stages (had_trouble, tvstat_gkey) include (trouble_resolve_time);
CREATE INDEX tvstage_hadtrouble_tvstat_idx ON road_truck_visit_stages (had_trouble, tvstat_gkey,trouble_resolve_time)

many-to-one.name: tvimgExchangeAreaCaptured
many-to-one.meta: Exchange Area where image was captured

many-to-one.meta: Exchange Area (Destination) to which this delay applies

property.name: gatexchdlyOriginGateStageId
property.meta: Origin Gate Stage from which this delay applies

many-to-one.name: gatexchdlyOriginXcharea
many-to-one.meta: Origin Exchange Area this delay applies to

many-to-one.meta: Operator that this truck action belongs to

property.name: trkactInfo
property.meta: Additional info for action (eg field to retry, location to proceed to)
